channel.title: Posts on The Pragmatic DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Pragmatic DevOps Engineer

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello, World!

In the beginning, the DevOps engineer created the version control system and the build and deploy pipeline.The infrastructure was without form and void, and darkness was over the face of the application. And the spirit of the DevOps engineer was hovering over the face of the APIs.
